Disable non-native modules

trans-unit.source: As non-native modules can experience some compatibility issues, we recommend to disable them by default.
trans-unit.target: As non-native modules can experience some compatibility issues, we recommend to disable them by default.

trans-unit.source: Keeping them enabled might prevent you from loading the "Modules" page properly after the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Keeping them enabled might prevent you from loading the "Modules" page properly after the upgrade.
Disable all overrides

trans-unit.source: Enable or disable all classes and controllers overrides.
trans-unit.target: Enable or disable all classes and controllers overrides.
Switch to the default theme

trans-unit.source: This will change your theme: your shop will then use the default theme of the version of PrestaShop you are upgrading to.
trans-unit.target: This will change your theme: your shop will then use the default theme of the version of PrestaShop you are upgrading to.
Regenerate RTL stylesheet

trans-unit.source: If enabled, any RTL-specific files that you might have added to all your themes might be deleted by the created stylesheet.
trans-unit.target: If enabled, any RTL-specific files that you might have added to all your themes might be deleted by the created stylesheet.
Keep the customized email templates

trans-unit.source: This will not upgrade the default PrestaShop e-mails.
trans-unit.target: This will not upgrade the default PrestaShop e-mails.

trans-unit.source: If you customized the default PrestaShop e-mail templates, enabling this option will keep your modifications.
trans-unit.target: If you customized the default PrestaShop e-mail templates, enabling this option will keep your modifications.

trans-unit.target: Back up my files and database

trans-unit.source: Automatically back up your database and files in order to restore your shop if needed. This is experimental: you should still perform your own manual backup for safety.
trans-unit.target: Automatically back up your database and files in order to restore your shop if needed. This is experimental: you should still perform your own manual backup for safety.

trans-unit.target: La versione attuale del modulo non è aggiornata. Aggiorna adesso
Moduli > Gestione Moduli > Aggiornamenti

trans-unit.source: The checklist is not OK. You can only upgrade your shop once all indicators are green.
trans-unit.target: La checklist non è OK. Puoi aggiornare il negozio solo quando tutti gli indicatori sono verdi.

trans-unit.source: Before starting the upgrade process, please make sure this checklist is all green.
trans-unit.target: Prima di iniziare il processo di aggiornamento, si prega di assicurarsi che la checklist sia tutta verde.

trans-unit.source: Your store's root directory (%s) is writable (with appropriate CHMOD permissions).
trans-unit.target: La directory principale del tuo negozio (%s) è scrivibile (con appropriati permessi CHMOD).

trans-unit.source: The "/admin/autoupgrade" directory is writable (appropriate CHMOD permissions)
trans-unit.target: La directory "/admin/autoupgrade" è scrivibile (con permessi CHMOD appropriati)

trans-unit.source: PHP's "Safe mode" option is turned off
trans-unit.target: L'opzione "Safe mode" del PHP deve essere messa in off

trans-unit.source: PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option is turned on, or cURL is installed
trans-unit.target: L'opzione "allow_url_fopen" del PHP è messa in on o è installato cURL
L'estensione "zip" del PHP è abilitata

trans-unit.source: Your store is in maintenance mode
trans-unit.target: Il tuo negozio si trova in modalità manutenzione

trans-unit.source: Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1]
trans-unit.target: Abilita la modalità di manutenzione e aggiungi il tuo IP di manutenzione in [1]Parametri negozio > Generali > Manutenzione[/1]
Le funzionalità di caching di PrestaShop sono disattivate

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting has a high value or is disabled entirely (current value: unlimited)
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione del PHP max_execution_time ha un valore alto o è disattivata completamente (valore attuale: illimitato)

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting has a high value or is disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds)
trans-unit.target: L'impostazione del PHP max_execution_time ha un valore alto o è disattivato completamente (valore attuale: %s secondi)
Il modulo Apache mod_rewrite è disabilitato.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extensions are not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: Le seguenti estensioni PHP non sono installate: %s.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extension is not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: La seguente estensione del PHP non è installata: %s.

trans-unit.source: PHP memory_limit is inferior to 256 MB.
trans-unit.target: Il valore memory_limit del PHP è inferiore a 256 MB.
La configurazione file_uploads del PHP è disabilitata.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP functions are not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: Le seguenti funzioni del PHP non sono installate: %s.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP function is not installed: %s.
trans-unit.target: La seguente funzione del PHP non è installata: %s.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to create a PHP session.
trans-unit.target: Impossibile creare una sessione PHP.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to write in the following folders:
trans-unit.target: Impossibile scrivere nelle seguenti cartelle:

trans-unit.source: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table. [1]Learn more[/1].
trans-unit.target: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table. [1]Learn more[/1].

trans-unit.source: Please also make sure you make a full manual backup of your files and database.
trans-unit.target: Assicurati di fare un backup manuale completo dei files e del database.
I requisiti di PrestaShop non sono soddisfatti.
Privacy policy
Your restoration is complete

trans-unit.source: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent recovery.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try emptying the cache.
Next steps
Troubleshooting

trans-unit.source: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.
trans-unit.target: If something's wrong, you can restore a backup with this module. Your backup is available at {admin}/autoupgrade/backup.

trans-unit.source: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.
trans-unit.target: If you can't access your back office, try enabling the debug mode manually in config/defines.inc.php by setting _PS_MODE_DEV_ to true.
Open developer documentation

trans-unit.source: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.
trans-unit.target: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.

trans-unit.source: Your store is up to date
trans-unit.target: Your store is up to date

trans-unit.source: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates
trans-unit.target: Before continuing with your tasks, please review the following checklist to ensure smooth operation after recent updates

trans-unit.source: Re-enable and check your modules one by one.
trans-unit.target: Re-enable and check your modules one by one.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your store's front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your store's front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.

trans-unit.source: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
trans-unit.target: If some images don't appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
--Scegli un backup da ripristinare--
Rollback

trans-unit.source: After upgrading your shop, you can rollback to the previous database and files. Use this function if your theme or an essential module is not working correctly.
trans-unit.target: Dopo avere aggiornato il tuo negozio puoi tornare indietro a database e files precedenti. Usa questa funzione se il tuo tema o un modulo essenziale non funzionano correttamente.
Scegli il tuo backup:
Altre opzioni (Per esperti)
Archivio da usare:
Scegli un archivio
File XML da utilizzare:
Seleziona un file XML

trans-unit.source: No archive found in your admin/autoupgrade/download directory
trans-unit.target: Nessun archivio trovato nella tua directory admin/autoupgrade/download
Salva
Inizia il tuo aggiornamento

trans-unit.source: You come from the future! You are using a more recent version than the latest available!
trans-unit.target: Tu arrivi dal futuro! Stai utilizzando una versione più recente dell'ultima disponibile!

trans-unit.source: Congratulations, you are already using the latest version available!
trans-unit.target: Congratulazioni stai già utilizzando l'ultima versione disponibile!
La tua versione attuale di PrestaShop
La tua versione attuale di PHP
Ultima versione ufficiale per il canale %s.
Aggiorna ora PrestaShop!
PrestaShop sarà scaricato da%s

trans-unit.source: Open changelog in a new window
trans-unit.target: Apri il changelog in una nuova finestra

trans-unit.source: No file will be downloaded (channel %s is used)
trans-unit.target: Nessun file sara scaricato (canale %s utilizzato)

trans-unit.source: The following action are automatically replaced
trans-unit.target: Le azioni seguenti sono automaticamente sostituite
%old% sarà sostituita da %new%

trans-unit.source: To change this behavior, you need to manually edit your php files
trans-unit.target: Per modificare questo comportamento, devi modificare manualmente i tuoi files php
Aggiorna la pagina

trans-unit.source: Check if a new version is available
trans-unit.target: Verifica se una nuova versione è disponibile
Ultimo controllo: %s
Ultimo controllo: mai
Modalità Esperto
Per favore seleziona il tuo canale:

trans-unit.source: Channels are offering you different ways to perform an upgrade. You can either upload the new version manually or let the Update assistant module download it for you.
trans-unit.target: Channels are offering you different ways to perform an upgrade. You can either upload the new version manually or let the Update assistant module download it for you.

trans-unit.source: The Alpha, Beta and Private channels give you the ability to upgrade to a non-official or unstable release (for testing purposes only).
trans-unit.target: I Canali Alfa, Beta e Privato ti danno la possibilità di aggiornare a una versione non ufficiale o instabile (solo per scopo di prova).

trans-unit.source: By default, you should use the "Minor release" channel which is offering the latest stable version available.
trans-unit.target: Per impostazione predefinita, è necessario utilizzare la "Minor release" canale che offre l'ultima versione stabile disponibile.
Canale:
Link:
Codice Hash:
Autorizza gli aggiornamenti maggiori:

trans-unit.source: Save in the following directory the archive file and XML file of the version you want to upgrade to: %s
trans-unit.target: Salva nella directory seguente il file compresso e il file XML della versione alla quale vuoi effettuare l'aggiornamento: %s

trans-unit.source: Click to save once the archive is there.
trans-unit.target: Clicca per salvare una volta che l'archivio si trova lì.

trans-unit.source: This option will skip the download step.
trans-unit.target: Questa opzione salterà la fase di download.

trans-unit.source: Save in the following directory the uncompressed PrestaShop files of the version you want to upgrade to: %s
trans-unit.target: Salva nella seguente directory i file non compressi di PrestaShop della versione alla quale vuoi effettuare l'aggiornamento: %s

trans-unit.source: Please tell us which version you are upgrading to [1](1.7.0.1 for instance)[/1]
trans-unit.target: Informaci sulla versione alla quale stai aggiornando [1](1.7.0.1, per esempio)[/1]

trans-unit.source: This option will skip both download and unzip steps and will use %1$s as the source directory
trans-unit.target: Questa opzione salterà le fasi di download e di decompressione e utilizzerà %1$s come directory sorgente
Confronto delle versioni
PrestaShop versione originale
Differenze tra le versioni

trans-unit.source: Select the backup you want to restore to
trans-unit.target: Select the backup you want to restore to
Delete selection

trans-unit.source: The "/admin/autoupgrade" directory isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.
trans-unit.target: The "/admin/autoupgrade" directory isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.

trans-unit.source: PHP's "Safe mode" needs to be disabled.
trans-unit.target: PHP's "Safe mode" needs to be disabled.

trans-unit.source: Files can't be downloaded. Enable PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option or install PHP extension "cURL".
trans-unit.target: Files can't be downloaded. Enable PHP's "allow_url_fopen" option or install PHP extension "cURL".
Missing PHP extension "zip".

trans-unit.source: Apache mod_rewrite needs to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: Apache mod_rewrite needs to be enabled.

trans-unit.source: PHP memory_limit needs to be greater than 256 MB.
trans-unit.target: PHP memory_limit needs to be greater than 256 MB.

trans-unit.source: PHP file_uploads configuration needs to be enabled.
trans-unit.target: PHP file_uploads configuration needs to be enabled.

trans-unit.source: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table.
trans-unit.target: The version of PrestaShop does not match the one stored in database. Your database structure may not be up-to-date and/or the value of PS_VERSION_DB needs to be updated in the configuration table.
Checking requirements...
Update requirements

trans-unit.source: Once all the following conditions are met, you can continue with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].
trans-unit.target: Once all the following conditions are met, you can continue with the update. Read more in the [1]developer documentation[/1].

trans-unit.source: Your current PHP version isn't compatible with PrestaShop %max_version%. (Expected: %min_version% - %max_version% | Current: %current_version%)
trans-unit.target: Your current PHP version isn't compatible with PrestaShop %max_version%. (Expected: %min_version% - %max_version% | Current: %current_version%)

trans-unit.source: Your store's root directory (%root_directory%) isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.
trans-unit.target: Your store's root directory (%root_directory%) isn't writable. Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.

trans-unit.source: Maintenance mode needs to be enabled. Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1].
trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode needs to be enabled. Enable maintenance mode and add your maintenance IP in [1]Shop parameters > General > Maintenance[/1].

trans-unit.source: PrestaShop's caching features needs to be disabled. Disable caching features in [1]Advanced parameters > Performance > Caching[/1].
trans-unit.target: PrestaShop's caching features needs to be disabled. Disable caching features in [1]Advanced parameters > Performance > Caching[/1].

trans-unit.source: PHP's max_execution_time setting needs to have a high value or needs to be disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds).
trans-unit.target: PHP's max_execution_time setting needs to have a high value or needs to be disabled entirely (current value: %s seconds).

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extensions need to be installed: %extensions%.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP extensions need to be installed: %extensions%.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP extension needs to be installed: %extension%.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP extension needs to be installed: %extension%.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP functions need to be allowed: %functions%.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP functions need to be allowed: %functions%.

trans-unit.source: The following PHP function needs to be allowed: %function%.
trans-unit.target: The following PHP function needs to be allowed: %function%.

trans-unit.source: It's not possible to write in the following folders: %directories%.
trans-unit.target: It's not possible to write in the following folders: %directories%.

trans-unit.source: Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.
trans-unit.target: Provide write access to the user running PHP with appropriate permission & ownership.

trans-unit.source: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now %link%
trans-unit.target: Your current version of the module is out of date. Update now %link%

trans-unit.source: Some core files have been altered, customization made on these files will be lost during the update. See the list in %link%
trans-unit.target: Some core files have been altered, customization made on these files will be lost during the update. See the list in %link%
Check requirements again

trans-unit.source: The requirements check is complete, you can update your store (to this version of PrestaShop).
trans-unit.target: The requirements check is complete, you can update your store (to this version of PrestaShop).

trans-unit.source: We couldn't find a PrestaShop version in the .zip file you uploaded. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: We couldn't find a PrestaShop version in the .zip file you uploaded. Please try again.

trans-unit.source: We couldn't find a PrestaShop version in the XML file that was uploaded in your local archive. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: We couldn't find a PrestaShop version in the XML file that was uploaded in your local archive. Please try again.
Warning summary
See warning
Error summary
See error
Yes
No
Back up your store

trans-unit.source: Backing up your store's files, database, and images means you can restore to a previous version if something goes wrong during the update. This keeps your data safe and ensures your business stays up and running.
trans-unit.target: Backing up your store's files, database, and images means you can restore to a previous version if something goes wrong during the update. This keeps your data safe and ensures your business stays up and running.
Launch backup
Post-update checklist

trans-unit.source: Open the developer documentation to keep this checklist at-hand.
trans-unit.target: Open the developer documentation to keep this checklist at-hand.

trans-unit.source: Re-enable and check your modules one by one to prevent any compatibility issue.
trans-unit.target: Re-enable and check your modules one by one to prevent any compatibility issue.

trans-unit.source: Make sure your store’s front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.
trans-unit.target: Make sure your store’s front office is working properly: try to create an account, place an order, add a product, etc.

trans-unit.source: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.
trans-unit.target: Disable the maintenance mode in General settings > Maintenance.

trans-unit.source: If some images don’t appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
trans-unit.target: If some images don’t appear in the front office, try regenerating thumbnails in Preferences > Images.
Download update logs
Exit

trans-unit.target: A more recent version of PrestaShop is available. You can also use a local archive.
Welcome to PrestaShop Update Assistant
Get Started
Benvenuto!

trans-unit.source: Upgrade your store to benefit from the latest improvements, bug fixes and security patches.
trans-unit.target: Aggiorna il tuo negozio per beneficiare degli ultimi miglioramenti, correzioni di bug e patch di sicurezza.

trans-unit.source: Upgrading your store on your own can be risky. If you don't feel comfortable doing the upgrade yourself, many agencies and developers in your area may also provide this kind of service.
trans-unit.target: Aggiornare da solo il tuo negozio può essere rischioso. Se non ti senti a tuo agio nell'eseguire l'aggiornamento da solo, molte aziende e sviluppatori nella tua zona potrebbero fornire questo tipo di servizio.
Delete
Cancel
Start backup

trans-unit.source: Help us improve the module by sending us this error report. You can add details in the description if you want to.
trans-unit.target: Help us improve the module by sending us this error report. You can add details in the description if you want to.

trans-unit.source: Before starting the update, make sure you have a complete and recent backup of your store (database, files, and images).
trans-unit.target: Before starting the update, make sure you have a complete and recent backup of your store (database, files, and images).

trans-unit.source: I have made my own backup and can restore it manually if a problem occur.
trans-unit.target: I have made my own backup and can restore it manually if a problem occur.
Start update
